SELECT NAME,IFNULL(SUM(REST),0)AS REST,IFNULL(SUM(PAID),0)AS PAID,IFNULL(SUM(CANCELED),0)AS CANCELED,IFNULL(SUM(REFUNDED),0) AS REFUNDED FROM PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN INVOICE B ON A.PRODUCT_ID=B.PRODUCT_ID GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY NAME

SELECT P.NAME, IFNULL(SUM(REST),0) AS REST , IFNULL(SUM(PAID),0) AS PAID, IFNULL(SUM(CANCELED),0) AS CANCELED, IFNULL(SUM(REFUNDED),0) AS REFUNDED FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN INVOICE I ON I.PRODUCT_ID =P.PRODUCT_ID GROUP BY P.NAME ORDER BY P.NAME
